item.description:
Hi Everyone!  I've so enjoyed the past dances I've attended. I'm really looking forward to hosting this next one and having a chance to dance with you all again. I hope you can make it! Feel free to email  me trish@contextcenters.com or call me directly at 413-320-3991, if you have any questions.  Trish

Join us on March 31st, for another opportunity to meet great people, have a blast dancing and possibly even meet your soulmate!

This time we will be starting the festivities off with some icebreakers and a variation on “speed dating”. A wonderful way to start to get to know each other and spark new connections.Then our fabulous DJ will tickle your toes and get us all grooving on the dance floor.

Drinks are available at the cash bar (playful fun from the bartender is free!) There'll be delicious appetizers, a hard-wood dance floor, and fabulous music from The Musical Dynamo!

7:30pm-8:30pm     “Speed Dating” Icebreakers

8:30pm-11:30pm   Dancing, Dance Contest and more!

This event is $20. You can pay at the door or prepay online. Attendance is limited so be sure to secure your spot by pre-paying for your ticket online when you RSVP. 

Note: You may find yourself temporarily on a wait-list if the gender balance is way off. As it rebalances itself you will be added back. Thanks for your understanding!  

﻿﻿
item.name: March Dance Party and More!
